Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_022376.4:c.258G>A increased cellular thermal sensitivity.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run once, with three samples per condition.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA served as a control in the CSA assay.

Basic negative control.Description: Null vector was used as a negative control in the CSA assay.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Tukey's multiple comparison test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cellular thermal sensitivity within the range of wild-type cDNA (<35°C).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cellular thermal sensitivity above the range of wild-type cDNA (>35°C).
